name: Nuclear Empire: idle tycoon
description:
Welcome to Nuclear Empire—a game where you can become an industrial idle tycoon.

All you have to do is follow a strategy to become the richest nuclear tycoon in our tapping game:

1) The path to wealth begins in the desert. Start your business by mining resources.
2) Make a lot of cash by selling these resources (uranium).
3) Buy new equipment and upgrade it.
4) Find new sites for energy production. You can build energy factories in various locations.

So, are you ready to start your way from zero to hero in our tap simulator?
